author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

With Adobe's stock price in a freefall over the past year it's worth asking what would happen if they replaced their current CEO with someone wholly unqualified for the role (Me). In this animated video I'm named CEO for the day and my job is to save Adobe.

title: How I Would Save Adobe
